tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Shoibalini is * ************* *** experienced general physician in Mumbai. During my recent visit to their clinic, I found her to be very approachable and attentive to my health concerns. She took the time to listen to my symptoms and provided a thorough examination to diagnose my condition. The doctor also explained the treatment plan in detail and answered all of my questions, which helped me feel more at ease. Overall, I would highly recommend Dr. Shoibalini to anyone seeking a reliable and caring general physician in Mumbai.

She was very patient in hearing out my previous history, was friendly and didnt rush through anything and explained everything in detail. And also explained why she was prescribing certain medications in extensive detail. All in all a very good visit. Will definitely recommend.

I contacted Dr Shoibalini when I was down with a very high fever, it reached 104. I was really worried but she told me to relax and her diagnosis was spot on. Not only this but she was available on call / whatsapp whenever i had the smallest of queries. Following her diagnosis, i was fit and fine within a week. Really appreciate her kind and caring attitude, which is what one looks for when consulting a doctor for the first time. Kudos to you doc!
reply_text: Thank you so much Srijan ðŸ¥° I hope you are doing much better now

review: Dr. Shoibalini is ********* ************* *** *** very helpful during the Covid situation. Me & my family was suffering because of covid and Dr. Shoibalini was always available. She took extreme good care of me as well as my family, kept a track of our SpO2 on regular basis, prescribing medication, diet etc. Even after we recovered she did a regular follow up to make sure the infection is gone and we are safe!
reply_text: Thank you so much ^_^ Hope you and your family are doing better :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Absolutely amazing experience! She patiently and politely answered All my vaccination related queries as well as my other health concerns. Goes above and beyond and very caring and sweet. Highly recommended.
Such a genuinely polite and patient doctor. She very kindly listened to all of my problems and offered excellent advice
reply_text: Thanks a ton sridevi ðŸ¥° Wish you good health!
